metadata.Title: CVE-2016-20015 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In the ebuild package through smokeping-2.7.3-r1 for SmokePing on Gentoo,the initscript allows the smokeping user to gain ownership of any file,allowing for the smokeping user to gain root privileges. There is a racecondition involving /var/lib/smokeping and chown.

criterions.comment: smokeping: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
